page.title: 09A day in the life of:-
page.content: An 11 year old Rolleston boy On Sunday I get up at about 8.30am. and get ready to go to fellowship which is like church yet different.When we get there we talk to people until someone starts to play a guitar and then the service begins.At 11.00a.m all the young people go to the various groups like Sunday School creche.I have a lot of fun at fellowship because we go on outings. At 12.00.p.m.fellowship finishes and we play on the swings outside until half-past,then we go home and have lunch.At1.45p.m.I call for my friend Gareth and play down the Brook or in my garden until 5.00p.m then Gareth has to go.Sometimes I play up my tree with my brother.Most Sunday evenings I watch television until 9.30p.m.then I go to bed.I read for half an hour then fall asleep.
